item.title: StartR: An Introduction to Reproducable Research in R
item.description: Below are the files used for an Introduction to R workshop give at Simon Fraser University on Tuesday, March 3rd, 2020 in conjunction with the Psychology Graduate Student Caucus. 0-RunFirst.R 1-IntroR.pdf 2a-Reproducible_Research.Rmd 2b-APA_Style 3-R_Packages_and_Support.Rmd Please feel to send comments or questions to me at mailto:msigal@sfu.ca.
